title: Since Riot is skimping VGU skins below 975, Volibear skins should get a price up to meet standard
body:
Namely El Rayo and Captain. 

Both of these skins have good potential for high quality in a VGU but currently are his 2 weakest skins compared to Thunder Lord and Runeguard, and Northern somewhere in the middle. TL obviously doesn't need a fresh VFX set since the theme isn't any different and Rune Guard will be really hard to fuck up. 

I would gladly put out a little more money for El Rayo to fully encapsulate the wrestler theme it currently fails to inspire.

replies.body: Morde has it worse, all his skins are gonna be chromas

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=G23YRMef,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-03-19T20:43:30.170+0000)
>
> Morde has it worse, all his skins are gonna be chromas

Not really. Take Evelynn for example. Her skins basically WERE chromas, but all got updated very nicely to be unique in their own way, even Shadow, which got a new recall and VFX. 

Infernal and Dragon Knight are both 520 skins, which will be the same level essentially as King of Clubs, his 750 skin. His other two skins, Pentakill and Lord are both 975 RP skins. So all the skins will get new models pertaining to their particular theme. Lord and Pentakill SHOULD get new VFX and new recalls to match their price point. I would guess a lot of emphasis will be placed on Pentakill, considering he's the lead of the band. I'd like to think they'd give Infernal some fiery effects instead of base particles, to match the other skins in the line.
Riot needs to fix their problems where they shorted Transcended and Sinful Succulence before worrying about your theorycrafting.
